name: Mega Ramp
description:
Mega Ramp brings to you the best of racing and stunting in this riding game. Control your speed and twist your car steering to drift your vehicles. Drive your vehicle straight on the track to reach the highest speeds, then you have to raise and land on the ramps. Use nitro to boost up your vehicle speed. Challenging impossible mega tracks to perform amazing high jumps and back flips.

Soar to the top speeds in the least amount of time to score the highest. Fasten up your seat belt. You must take a high speed on the ramp, control the speed and jump off the track to destroy various monster vehicles. Drive the car and avoid the collision with the obstacles. You will never experience this kind of thrill before. 3D angles of the grand high jump of the crazy auto vehicle. Vertical mega ramp environments with addictive HD 3D immersive graphics.
